property.name: isValid
property.shortdesc: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.

property.name: parent
property.shortdesc: The parent of the PasteboardPreference (a Application or Document).

property.name: pasteboardMargins
property.shortdesc: The minimum horizontal and vertical pasteboard margins. A horizontal margin of -1 means one document page width

property.name: previewBackgroundColor
property.shortdesc: The color of the preview background, specified either as an array of three doubles, each in the range 0 to 255, representing R, G, and B values, or as a UI color. Can return: Array of 3 Reals (0 - 255) or UIColors enumerator.

property.name: bleedGuideColor
property.shortdesc: The color of bleed guides, specified either as an array of three doubles, each in the range 0 to 255, representing R, G, and B values, or as a UI color. Can return: Array of 3 Reals (0 - 255) or UIColors enumerator.

property.name: slugGuideColor
property.shortdesc: The color of slug guides, specified either as an array of three doubles, each in the range 0 to 255, representing R, G, and B values, or as a UI color. Can return: Array of 3 Reals (0 - 255) or UIColors enumerator.

property.name: matchPreviewBackgroundToThemeColor
property.shortdesc: If true, match the Preview Background color to Theme Color, else use the color-value specified in Preview Background color drop down.

property.name: properties
property.shortdesc: A property that allows setting of several properties at the same time.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the PasteboardPreference.

method.name: getElements
method.shortdesc: Resolves the object specifier, creating an array of object references.

parameters.name: handler
parameters.shortdesc: The event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.

parameters.name: handler
parameters.shortdesc: The registered event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.
